Built-in ChatBot Features<\/h4>\n<p>Predefined intents can work without integration to DialogFlow API and AI. These are readily available as soon as you install the plugin and can be turned on or off individually. The following predefined intents are below.<\/p>\n<ul style=\"list-style: circle;padding-left: 10px;margin-top: 10px;\">\n<li>Simple Text Responses (searchable Q & A created directly inside WP backend)<\/li>\n<li>Frequently Asked Questions<\/li>\n<li>Advanced Site Search<\/li>\n<li>Newsletter Subscription<\/li>\n<li>Send eMail, Call Me Back & Feedback Collection<\/li>\n<\/ul>\";}}s:11:\"fld_7193635\";a:7:{s:2:\"ID\";s:11:\"fld_7193635\";s:4:\"type\";s:8:\"dropdown\";s:5:\"label\";s:0:\"\";s:4:\"slug\";s:11:\"next_button\";s:10:\"additional\";s:0:\"\";s:10:\"conditions\";a:1:{s:4:\"type\";s:0:\"\";}s:6:\"config\";a:11:{s:9:\"auto_type\";s:0:\"\";s:8:\"taxonomy\";s:8:\"category\";s:9:\"post_type\";s:4:\"post\";s:11:\"value_field\";s:4:\"name\";s:11:\"orderby_tax\";s:4:\"name\";s:12:\"orderby_post\";s:4:\"name\";s:5:\"order\";s:3:\"ASC\";s:7:\"default\";s:0:\"\";s:6:\"option\";a:1:{s:10:\"opt1585906\";a:3:{s:10:\"calc_value\";s:4:\"Next\";s:5:\"value\";s:4:\"Next\";s:5:\"label\";s:4:\"Next\";}}s:16:\"email_identifier\";i:0;s:22:\"personally_identifying\";i:0;}}s:10:\"fld_535508\";a:7:{s:2:\"ID\";s:10:\"fld_535508\";s:4:\"type\";s:4:\"html\";s:5:\"label\";s:16:\"html__fld_535508\";s:4:\"slug\";s:15:\"html_fld_535508\";s:10:\"additional\";s:0:\"\";s:10:\"conditions\";a:1:{s:4:\"type\";s:0:\"\";}s:6:\"config\";a:1:{s:7:\"default\";s:808:\"<h4>Custom intents - Created Inside DialogFlow<\/h4>\n<p>Intents created in Dialogflow give you the power to build a truly human like, intelligent and comprehensive chatbot. Build any type of Intents and Responses (including rich message responses) directly in DialogFlow and train the bot accordingly. When you create custom intents and responses in DialogFlow, WPBot will automatically display them when user inputs match with your Custom Intents along with the responses you created.<\/p>\n<p>WPBot also supports Rich responses using Facebook Messenger integration. This allows you to display Image, Cards, Quick Text Reply or Custom PayLoad inside the ChatBot window. You can also insert an image or youtube video link inside the DialogFlow responses and they will be automatically rendered by the WPBot!<\/p>\";}}s:11:\"fld_7732451\";a:7:{s:2:\"ID\";s:11:\"fld_7732451\";s:4:\"type\";s:8:\"dropdown\";s:5:\"label\";s:0:\"\";s:4:\"slug\";s:14:\"next_next_next\";s:10:\"additional\";s:0:\"\";s:10:\"conditions\";a:1:{s:4:\"type\";s:0:\"\";}s:6:\"config\";a:11:{s:9:\"auto_type\";s:0:\"\";s:8:\"taxonomy\";s:8:\"category\";s:9:\"post_type\";s:4:\"post\";s:11:\"value_field\";s:4:\"name\";s:11:\"orderby_tax\";s:4:\"name\";s:12:\"orderby_post\";s:4:\"name\";s:5:\"order\";s:3:\"ASC\";s:7:\"default\";s:0:\"\";s:6:\"option\";a:1:{s:10:\"opt1585906\";a:3:{s:10:\"calc_value\";s:4:\"Next\";s:5:\"value\";s:4:\"Next\";s:5:\"label\";s:4:\"Next\";}}s:16:\"email_identifier\";i:0;s:22:\"personally_identifying\";i:0;}}s:11:\"fld_3908165\";a:7:{s:2:\"ID\";s:11:\"fld_3908165\";s:4:\"type\";s:4:\"html\";s:5:\"label\";s:17:\"html__fld_3908165\";s:4:\"slug\";s:16:\"html_fld_3908165\";s:10:\"additional\";s:0:\"\";s:10:\"conditions\";a:1:{s:4:\"type\";s:0:\"\";}s:6:\"config\";a:1:{s:7:\"default\";s:910:\"<h4>Menu Driven - Created with Conversational Form Builder Addon<\/h4>\n<p>Extend the Start Menu with the powerful Conversational Forms  Addon for WPBot. It extends WPBot\u2019s functionality and adds the ability to create conditional conversations and\/or forms for the WPBot. It is a visual, drag and drop form builder that is easy to use and very flexible. Supports conditional logic and use of variables to build all types of forms or just menu driven conversations with if else logic. Conversations or forms can be eMailed to you and saved in the database.<\/p>\n<p>Conversation Forms Pro allows you to create a wide variety of forms, that might include:<\/p>\n<ul style=\"list-style: circle;padding-left: 10px;margin-top: 10px;\">\n<li>Conditional Menu Driven Conversations<\/li>\n<li>Standard Contact Forms<\/li>\n<li>Job Application Forms<\/li>\n<li>Lead Capture Forms<\/li>\n<li>Various types of Calculators etc.<\/li>\n<ul>\";}}}s:6:\"mailer\";a:4:{s:11:\"sender_name\";s:26:\"Chatbot Forms Notification\";s:12:\"sender_email\";s:0:\"\";s:10:\"recipients\";s:0:\"\";s:13:\"email_subject\";s:22:\"WPBot Backend Features\";}s:18:\"conditional_groups\";a:1:{s:5:\"magic\";N;}s:24:\"privacy_exporter_enabled\";b:0;s:7:\"version\";s:5:\"1.5.1\";}"}
